sentences.sContent: The two sides agreed to set up a commission to investigate claims.
sentences.sCn: 双方同意成立一个委员会，调查索赔问题。

sentences.sContent: ...an organization which sets up meetings about issues of interest to women.
sentences.sCn: …一个安排有关妇女利益问题的会议组织。

phrases.pCn: 准备时间；建立时间；设置时间

trans.tranOther: If you set something up, you create or arrange it
